title: By Hook or by Crook
description: By Hook or by Crook tells the story of Ruth and Charlie, two American children living through the Great Depression. After their father leaves and their mother passes away, Ruth and Charlie need to find a way from Missouri to their grandparents in California. With its engaging characters and taut storytelling, By Hook or by Crook teaches students important lessons about a devastating era in American history. The book can also be used to analyze characters as well as to make, revise, and confirm predictions.
